oked int the hole that now was dimly illuminated by a faint redness.=A0 The=
y ran.=A0 He would not be detered by a little smoke and lava.=A0 Worse had =

tures.=A0 Not sparing te cowards a second glance or words, he jumped down i=
nto thehole.

ontinued into the air via some sort of anti-gravity propulsion. "ANYWHERE B=
